div.p: I am an ACCESS student at DeSales University.
I have a dual major-it's Business Management and Marketing.
I first started at DeSales in '99.
I was in Operations and I wanted to become an Operations Manager.
So I came back to school as a Business major, Business Management.
And life changes, I took 6 years off, and when I came back,
I found that I had a passion for advertising and marketing.
At the time, I didn't have any of my electives completed-I was working
on all my core courses the previous time I was here.
I had enough to add Marketing as a second major.
I work at B. Braun Medical.
I'm working as Project Administrator right now, and I work full time.
And as of this evening, I'm finished with my school full time.
